definition: as might be expected, a mode of action, to hunt with hounds
details:
adverb
- as might be expected
= synonyms: naturally
noun
- a mode of action
= example: a mode of action
= synonyms: course of action
- education imparted in a series of lessons or meetings
= example: education imparted in a series of lessons or meetings
= synonyms: course of study
- facility consisting of a circumscribed area of land or water laid out for a sport
= example: facility consisting of a circumscribed area of land or water laid out for a sport
- a layer of masonry, in construction
= example: a layer of masonry, in construction
= synonyms: row
- part of a meal served at one time
= example: part of a meal served at one time
- a body of students who are taught together
= synonyms: form
- a connected series of events or actions or developments
= example: a connected series of events or actions or developments
= synonyms: line
- general line of orientation
= example: general line of orientation
= synonyms: trend
- a line or route along which something travels or moves
= synonyms: path
verb
- to hunt with hounds
= example: to hunt with hounds
- to move along, of liquids
= synonyms: run
- to move swiftly through or over
